    • retrieveDraft

      @GetMapping(value="/user/{uid}", produces="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.util.List<Draft>> retrieveDraft​(@PathVariable java.lang.String uid) throws NotFoundException
      This will find all draft for specific userId and
      Parameters:
      uid - user_id of the draft you want to retrieve
      Returns:
      List of Draft
      Throws:
      javax.persistence.EntityNotFoundException
      NotFoundException

    • createDraft

      @PostMapping(consumes="application/json") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> createDraft​(@RequestBody DraftDTO newDraft) throws NotFoundException, java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      s

      POST createDraft API

      This will create draft in the database, according to user_id

      Parameters:
      newDraft - This is the Draft entity
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity
      Throws:
      NotFoundException
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

    • saveWorkingDraft

      @PutMapping(consumes="application/json", path="{draftId}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<java.lang.Object> saveWorkingDraft​(@RequestBody DraftDTO workingDraft, @PathVariable java.lang.Long draftId) throws NotFoundException

      PUT saveDraft API

      This will save the working draft when the user hit save, base on user id and draft after its has been created by createDraft API

      Parameters:
      workingDraft - This is the draft user are working on, and want to save
      draftId - ID of the draft
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity (Draft is save)
      Throws:
      NotFoundException
